Table.TableDec: 成员表（包括学生、老师、管理员）

Field.DataDec: [Enum-{INTELLIGENCE:普通排序},{NEAREST:离我最近},{LATEST_RELEASE:最新发布},{POPULAR_JOB:热门兼职},{HIGH_SALARY:薪资最高},{APPLY_COUNT:招聘人数}][CtrlTypeDic-{SelectDrop}]
结算方式:[Enum-{YEAR:年结},{DAY:日结},{WEEK:周结},{MONTH:月结},{OVER:完工结算},{OTHER:其他结算}][CtrlTypeDic-{SelectDrop}]
工资的时间单位:[Enum-{TIMES:元/次},{DAY:元/天},{HOUR:元/小时}][CtrlTypeDic-{SmallText}]
状态:[Enum-{TO_ACCEPT:报名成功，请等待商家录取},{CANCEL:已取消报名},{REMIND_COMPANY:已提醒商家录取，请耐心等待},{REFUSE_ADMIT:被商家取消录取}][CtrlTypeDic-{InputString}]
标签类型:[Enum-{USER_TAG:用户标签},{SYSTEM_TAG:系统标签}]

Table.TableDec: 科目表(证书下面分科目):[IDField-{Id:0}]

Field.DataDec: 用户的标识，对当前公众号唯一:[CtrlTypeDic-{InputString}]
选项类型-1为4选项，2为2选项:[Enum-{1:"四选项"},{2:"二选项"}][CtrlTypeDic-{InputString}]
选项类型-1为4选项，2为2选项:[Enum-{1:"四选项"},{2:"二选项"}][CtrlTypeDic-{InputString}]
用户的标识，对当前公众号唯一:[CtrlTypeDic-{InputString}]
用户的标识，对当前公众号唯一:[CtrlTypeDic-{InputString}]
用户的标识，对当前公众号唯一:[CtrlTypeDic-{InputString}]

Table.TableDec: 源信息//大学编号或家教学生

Field.DataDec: 用户头像，最后一个数值代表正方形头像大小（有0、46、64、96、132数值可选，0代表640*640正方形头像），用户没有头像时该项为空。若用户更换头像，原有头像URL将失效。:[CtrlTypeDic-{InputString}]
用户的性别，值为1时是男性，值为2时是女性，值为0时是未知:[CtrlTypeDic-{InputString}]
用户的标识，对当前公众号唯一:[CtrlTypeDic-{InputString}]
用户的性别，值为1时是男性，值为2时是女性，值为0时是未知:[CtrlTypeDic-{InputString}]
用户的标识，对当前公众号唯一:[CtrlTypeDic-{InputString}]
用户是否订阅该公众号标识，值为0时，代表此用户没有关注该公众号，拉取不到其余信息。:[CtrlTypeDic-{InputString}]
用户的性别，值为1时是男性，值为2时是女性，值为0时是未知:[CtrlTypeDic-{InputString}]
用户头像，最后一个数值代表正方形头像大小（有0、46、64、96、132数值可选，0代表640*640正方形头像），用户没有头像时该项为空。若用户更换头像，原有头像URL将失效。:[CtrlTypeDic-{InputString}]
用户关注时间，为时间戳。如果用户曾多次关注，则取最后关注时间:[CtrlTypeDic-{InputString}]
只有在用户将公众号绑定到微信开放平台帐号后，才会出现该字段。:[CtrlTypeDic-{InputString}]
错误时微信会返回错误码等信息:[CtrlTypeDic-{InputString}]
错误时微信会返回错误码等信息:[CtrlTypeDic-{InputString}]
用户头像，最后一个数值代表正方形头像大小（有0、46、64、96、132数值可选，0代表640*640正方形头像），用户没有头像时该项为空。若用户更换头像，原有头像URL将失效。:[CtrlTypeDic-{InputString}]

Table.TableDec: 单次课程信息（一个讲师有多个课程）

Field.DataDec: 用户的标识，对当前公众号唯一:[CtrlTypeDic-{InputString}]
擅长的科目与高考成绩（英语、数学等），才艺与才艺等级（钢琴、画画几级）:[CtrlTypeDic-{InputString}]
用户的标识，对当前公众号唯一:[CtrlTypeDic-{InputString}]
意向工作区域（2个以上县市名及工作时间）如:[CtrlTypeDic-{InputString}]
有过哪些辅导或家教经验【小学、初、高中生或亲友小孩】（越详细越好123）:[CtrlTypeDic-{InputString}]
奖学金和特长与竞赛名次:[CtrlTypeDic-{InputString}]
家乡所在工作区域（城市和县区名）如:[CtrlTypeDic-{InputString}]

View.Sql:
CREATE PROCEDURE sp_getJSONFields @Json VARCHAR(MAX) AS BEGIN SELECT @Json=REPLACE(@Json,'{','') SELECT @Json=REPLACE(@Json,'}',',') DECLARE @temp VARCHAR(100) DECLARE @objName VARCHAR(30) DECLARE @objValue VARCHAR(30) DECLARE @fieldSql VARCHAR(MAX) SET @fieldSql='select '
WHILE LEN(@Json)>0 BEGIN SELECT @temp=SUBSTRING(@Json,0,CHARINDEX(',',@Json,0)) --PRINT @temp SELECT @Json=RIGHT(@Json,LEN(@Json)-LEN(@temp)-1) --PRINT @Json
set @objName =left(@temp,CHARINDEX(':',@temp,0)-1) set @objValue =right(@temp,len(@temp)-CHARINDEX(':',@temp,0))
--PRINT @objName+'='+ @objValue+';' set @fieldSql=@fieldSql+REPLACE(@objValue,'"','''')+' as '+REPLACE(@objName,'"','')+','
--PRINT '------------------' END SET @fieldSql=LEFT(@fieldSql,LEN(@fieldSql)-1)
--EXEC sp_executesql @fieldSql EXEC (@fieldSql) END

CREATE VIEW v_jz_userApplyManages AS SELECT dbo.jz_userApplyManages.status, dbo.jz_userApplyManages.secondStatus, dbo.jz_userApplyManages.user_id, dbo.jz_partJobs.partJobId, dbo.jz_partJobs.partJobUuid, dbo.jz_partJobs.addressDetail, dbo.jz_partJobs.areaId AS Expr1, dbo.jz_partJobs.category, dbo.jz_partJobs.clearingForm, dbo.jz_partJobs.companyType AS Expr2, dbo.jz_partJobs.companyUuid AS Expr3, dbo.jz_partJobs.contacter, dbo.jz_partJobs.createTime, dbo.jz_partJobs.distance, dbo.jz_partJobs.entryCount, dbo.jz_partJobs.duration, dbo.jz_partJobs.entryDeadline, dbo.jz_partJobs.hotScore, dbo.jz_partJobs.jobCount, dbo.jz_partJobs.jobTimeStandard, dbo.jz_partJobs.jobTime, dbo.jz_partJobs.latitude AS Expr4, dbo.jz_partJobs.longitude AS Expr5, dbo.jz_partJobs.needInterview, dbo.jz_partJobs.newJobStandTime, dbo.jz_partJobs.partJobLogo, dbo.jz_partJobs.partJobTitle, dbo.jz_partJobs.salary, dbo.jz_partJobs.sexRequire, dbo.jz_partJobs.salaryUnit, dbo.jz_partJobs.salaryTimeUnit, dbo.jz_partJobs.status AS Expr6, dbo.jz_partJobs.townId AS Expr7, dbo.jz_partJobs.type, dbo.jz_partJobs.addressBuilding, dbo.jz_partJobs.viewCount, dbo.jz_partJobs.bondMoney, dbo.jz_partJobs.user_id AS Expr8, dbo.jz_partJobs.partJobTags, dbo.jz_partJobs.ModifyTime, dbo.jz_partJobs.classificationId, dbo.jz_partJobs.parentId, dbo.jz_partJobs.workTime, dbo.jz_partJobs.jobDescription, dbo.jz_partJobs.salaryTicketType, dbo.jz_partJobs.CompanyId AS Expr9, dbo.jz_partJobs.bonus, dbo.jz_partJobs.welfare, dbo.jz_partJobs.contentPrompt, dbo.jz_partJobs.heightRequire, dbo.jz_partJobs.interviewTime, dbo.jz_partJobs.healthRequire, dbo.jz_partJobs.interviewAddress, dbo.jz_company.companyName, dbo.jz_company.longitude, dbo.jz_company.latitude, dbo.jz_company.name, dbo.jz_company.companyLogo, dbo.jz_company.companyScale, dbo.jz_company.companyShareContent, dbo.jz_company.chargerName, dbo.jz_company.companyShareLogo, dbo.jz_company.companyShareTitle, dbo.jz_company.companyShareUrl, dbo.jz_company.companyType, dbo.jz_company.email, dbo.jz_company.authenticated, dbo.jz_company.accountName, dbo.jz_company.townId, dbo.jz_company.role, dbo.jz_company.position, dbo.jz_partJobs.businessType FROM dbo.jz_company RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.jz_partJobs ON dbo.jz_company.companyUuid = dbo.jz_partJobs.companyUuid RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.jz_userApplyManages ON dbo.jz_partJobs.partJobUuid = dbo.jz_userApplyManages.partJobUuid

CREATE VIEW Vkemu AS SELECT dbo.TkemuInfo.id, dbo.TkemuInfo.kemuId, dbo.TkemuInfo.kemuName, dbo.TkemuInfo.pId, dbo.TkemuInfo.ZsId, dbo.TzsInfo.zsName FROM dbo.TkemuInfo LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.TzsInfo ON dbo.TkemuInfo.ZsId = dbo.TzsInfo.zsId
CREATE VIEW VSchool AS SELECT dbo.TscWxInfo.sc_id, dbo.TscWxInfo.sc_name, dbo.TSchool.* FROM dbo.TSchool LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.TscWxInfo ON dbo.TSchool.Id = dbo.TscWxInfo.school_id

CREATE VIEW VTimuDaXue AS SELECT dbo.TTimuDaXue.AutoId, dbo.TTimuDaXue.Id, dbo.TTimuDaXue.answer, dbo.TTimuDaXue.chapterId, dbo.TTimuDaXue.difficulty, dbo.TTimuDaXue.explain, dbo.TTimuDaXue.label, dbo.TTimuDaXue.mediaHeight, dbo.TTimuDaXue.mediaType, dbo.TTimuDaXue.mediaWidth, dbo.TTimuDaXue.optionA, dbo.TTimuDaXue.optionB, dbo.TTimuDaXue.optionC, dbo.TTimuDaXue.optionD, dbo.TTimuDaXue.optionE, dbo.TTimuDaXue.optionF, dbo.TTimuDaXue.optionG, dbo.TTimuDaXue.optionH, dbo.TTimuDaXue.optionType, dbo.TTimuDaXue.question, dbo.TTimuDaXue.questionId, dbo.TTimuDaXue.mediaContent, dbo.TTimuDaXue.falseCount, dbo.TTimuDaXue.trueCount, dbo.TTimuDaXue.wrongRate, dbo.TTimuDaXue.sourceFile, dbo.TTimuDaXue.sourceid, dbo.TTimuDaXue.sourceZhangjie, dbo.TTimuDaXue.optionnum, dbo.TTimuDaXue.kemu, dbo.TTimuDaXue.url, dbo.TTimuDaXue.sc, dbo.TTimuDaXue.area, dbo.TTimuDaXue.user_id, dbo.TTimuDaXue.diggUp, dbo.TTimuDaXue.diggDown, dbo.TTimuDaXue.IsRepeatTf, dbo.TTimuDaXue.ExamType, dbo.TTimuDaXue.Analysis, dbo.TTimuDaXue.LinkExam, dbo.TTimuDaXue.OrderId, dbo.TTimuDaXue.Teacher, dbo.TTimuDaXue.Knowledge, dbo.TTimuDaXue.YearId, dbo.TTimuDaXue.PaperShortName, dbo.TTimuDaXue.kemuId, dbo.TTimuDaXue.OptionStr, dbo.TTimuDaXue.AnswerABC, dbo.TTimuDaXue.KaoDian, dbo.TkemuInfo.kemuName, dbo.TkemuInfo.ZsId FROM dbo.TTimuDaXue RIGHT OUTER JOIN dbo.TkemuInfo ON dbo.TTimuDaXue.kemuId = dbo.TkemuInfo.kemuId
CREATE VIEW VTimuDaXueErrorInfo AS SELECT errorSum, answerSum, openId FROM dbo.TTimuDaXueErrorInfo
CREATE VIEW VzsInfo AS SELECT dbo.TzsTypeInfo.typeName, dbo.TzsInfo.Id, dbo.TzsInfo.zsName FROM dbo.TzsInfo LEFT OUTER JOIN dbo.TzsTypeInfo ON dbo.TzsInfo.ZsTypeId = dbo.TzsTypeInfo.Id
